property.name: text
property.value:
Features are collected into a map-like data structure as key-value pairs. The names are the port names of the RecordAssembler.
The dummy implementation expects values between 0 and 1. The name can be prefixed with a 4-digit code to specify for which domain the value is encoded, e.g. 0101. The order for the domains is:
Ethics, Affordances, Aesthetics, Epistemics
